name: Ball51
description:
Ball51  is a physics based puzzle plattformer developed during a course at Graz, University of Technology.  

It's an homage to the Area51 alien mythos.

Puzzle yourself through 24 stages. Place power-ups and objects into the scene, so the ball can reach the goal!

Controls:

-Left Mouse Button: Select Objects/Place Objects
-Right Mouse Button: Delete Placed Objects

If there are any bugs with graphics or gameplay, please let us know.
